data.name: VR Casino
data.description:
VR Casino is here! – The best all-in-one option Casino Games give you extraordinary casino experiences with a huge casino bonus – 1,000,000 Chips.

Start your fantasy Las Vegas-style casino journey with VR Casino now! Play the slot and table games you know and love, with realistic and stunning graphic, authentic casino sounds further adds to the experience. 

THE MOST FAMOUS TABLE GAMES
Blackjack & Baccarat, the most popular casino games in the world. Play as if you are in casino, squeezing the cards just like in real casino makes the game exciting to play!

SLOT MACHINE & DELECTABLE SPINS
TOP slots games right here, Wheel of Jackpot, Thunder of Zeus, Blazing Hit and Cosmic Wild! Which one will be your lucky slot?
And more Slots await! 

MASSIVE FREE CHIPS
* Daily Wheel Bonus
* Time Bonus
* All-in Bonus
* Level Up Bonus
* Bonus increases along with your level! 
And much more free chips for fun all day long!

Find more information at our Fan page: 
https://www.facebook.com/VRCasinoFans

changelog.change_log:
Hi VR Casino Fans!
Here's a new update with fixes to improve your game experience!!
Have fun & good luck!

Hi VR Casino Fans!
Here's a new update with fixes to improve your game experience!!
Have fun & good luck!

Hi VR Casino Fans!

Here's a new update with fixes to improve your game experience!

Have fun & good luck!

VR Casino is now available in Oculus Go!
Good Luck!

- Minor Bugs are fixed for better game experiences.
- Time Bonus UI Enhancement.

User Experience Enhancement
- Daily Attendance Event for more Free Chips
- Time Bonus Event for more Free Chips
 
System Enhancement
- Automatic recognition of Gear VR Controller
- Effect enhancement of Level-Up
- Effect enhancement of Winning Chips
- No count limitation for Auto Spin
- Notification added including On/Off button in Settings.

*Update Note
- Ingame Noticeboard is now activated.
- Blackjack & Baccarat 3D dealer models face changed.
- Gear VR Controller is now available to use.
- Improvement on game experience.
